Workflow.Name: Set current fiscal quarter
Workflow.Description: The current fiscal quarter is used to generate the overdue work order view. Its value is set to planned fiscal quarter or revised quarter depend on the condition.

LocalizedName.description: Établir le trimestre d’exercice en cours

Description.description: The current fiscal quarter is used to generate the overdue work order view. Its value is set to planned fiscal quarter or revised quarter depend on the condition.
Le trimestre d’exercice en cours sert à générer la vue des ordres de travail en retard. Sa valeur est fixée au trimestre d’exercice prévu ou au trimestre révisé, selon la condition.
